#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
    verify(sp_log_svr_);
    int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
    ret = ret << 32;
    ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++;
    return ret; 
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /*
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  // createCoroutine
  // var.wait
  //  Coroutine::CreateRun([this](){
        auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
        string oid_ = to_string(oid);
        s->data_.push_back(oid_);
        s->data_.push_back("put");
        s->data_.push_back(k);
        s->data_.push_back(v);
        Log_info("kvserver %d - received put - oid %s\n",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
        shared_ptr<IntEvent> ev=NULL;
        bool isLeader=false;
        {
          std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
          uint64_t dummy=0;
          uint64_t *index,*term;
          index = term = &dummy;
          shared_ptr<Marshallable> m(s);
          isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(m,index,term);
          Log_info("kvserver %d - put - isLeader %d",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,isLeader?1:0);
          if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
          ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
          eventmachine[oid_] = ev;
        }
        Log_info("kvserver %d waiting for put %s",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
        ev->Wait(MYTIMEOUT);
        {
          std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
          eventmachine.erase(oid_);
          if(ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT){
            Log_info("kvserver %d - put - oid %s TIMEOUT",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
            return KV_TIMEOUT;
          }


          Log_info("kvserver %d - put - oid %s SUCCESS",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
          return KV_SUCCESS;
        }
    //});
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid,
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  //Coroutine::CreateRun([this](){
      auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
      string oid_ = to_string(oid);
      s->data_.push_back(oid_);
      s->data_.push_back("append");
      s->data_.push_back(k);
      s->data_.push_back(v);
      Log_info("kvserver %d - received append - oid %s",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
      shared_ptr<IntEvent> ev;
      bool isLeader=false;

      {
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
        uint64_t dummy=0;
        uint64_t *index,*term;
        index = term = &dummy;
        shared_ptr<Marshallable> m(s);
        isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(m,index,term);
        Log_info("kvserver %d - append - isLeader %d",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,isLeader?1:0);
        if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
        ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
        eventmachine[oid_] = ev;
      }
      Log_info("kvserver %d waiting for append %s",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
      ev->Wait(MYTIMEOUT);
      {
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
        eventmachine.erase(oid_);
        if(ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT){
          Log_info("kvserver %d - append - oid %s TIMEOUT",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
          return KV_TIMEOUT;
        }


        Log_info("kvserver %d - append - oid %s SUCCESS",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
  //});
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  //Coroutine::CreateRun([this](){
  Log_info("kvserver received get\n");
      auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
      string oid_ = to_string(oid);
      s->data_.push_back(oid_);
      s->data_.push_back("get");
      s->data_.push_back(k);
      Log_info("kvserver %d - received get - oid %s",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
      shared_ptr<IntEvent> ev;
      bool isLeader=false;
      {
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
        uint64_t dummy=0;
        uint64_t *index,*term;
        index = term = &dummy;
        shared_ptr<Marshallable>m(s);
        isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(m,index,term);
        Log_info("kvserver %d - get - isLeader %d",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,isLeader?1:0);
        if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
        ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
        eventmachine[oid_] = ev;
      }
      Log_info("kvserver %d waiting for get %s",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
      ev->Wait(MYTIMEOUT);
      {
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
        eventmachine.erase(oid_);
        if(ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT){
          Log_info("kvserver %d - get - oid %s TIMEOUT",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
          return KV_TIMEOUT;
        }
        *v = getmachine[oid_];
        getmachine.erase(oid_);
        Log_info("kvserver %d - get - oid %s SUCCESS",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
  //});
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
  string oid_ = v->data_[0];
  string type = v->data_[1];
  string key =  v->data_[2];
  Log_info("kvserver %d - onNextCommand - oid %s - type %s - key %s\n",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str(),type.c_str(),key.c_str());
  if(type=="put"){
      string value = v->data_[3];
      hashmachine[key]=value;
  }else if(type=="append"){


      string value = v->data_[3];
      if(hashmachine.find(key)==hashmachine.end()){
          hashmachine[key]=value;
      }else{
          hashmachine[key]+=value;
      }
  }else if(type=="get"){
    string value = hashmachine[key];
    getmachine[oid_] = value;
  }else{
    Log_info("kvserver %d - onNextCommand - UNKNOWN TYPE ERROR\n",sp_log_svr_->site_id_);
  }
  auto it = eventmachine.find(oid_);
  if(it!=eventmachine.end()){
    if(it->second!=NULL) it->second->Set(1);
    Log_info("kvserver %d - onNextCommand - oid %s EVENT PROCESSED\n",sp_log_svr_->site_id_,oid_.c_str());
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++;
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
